Class Zombie

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Zombie
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicZombie

    public abstract class Zombie
extends Entity
    Abstract class that contains all Zombies within the game (BasicZombie)

    Oct 29, 2018
    Author:
    Simon Krol
